name: CircularGaugeStyle
desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using an open ring, which has a visual indicator as the value increases, and displays the currentValueLabel the center of the gauge.

items.name: static var circular: CircularGaugeStyle
items.desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using an open ring, which has a visual indicator as the value increases, and displays the currentValueLabel the center of the gauge.

items.name: init(tint: Color)
items.desc: Construct a circular gauge that draws with a Color.

items.name: init(tint: Gradient)
items.desc: Construct a circular gauge that draws with a gradient.

items.name: func makeBody(configuration: CircularGaugeStyle.Configuration) -> some View
items.desc: Creates a view representing the body of a gauge.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: A view representing the body of a gauge.
